data.name: Carve Snowboarding
data.description:
The creator of 1080 Snowboarding is back with an all new snowboarding experience! Hit the slopes and encounter realistic arcade snowboarding like never before.

Dominate the mountain your own way with two unique modes: 
● Show your need for speed and snag the top Leader Board spot in Time Attack! 
● Master tricks and show off your skills in Freestyle, now with Leaderboards!

There’s plenty of gear to find while you make your way through the mountain. Unlock new boards, gloves, and even mixtapes to explore the mountain in style! You can also chill in your cabin to check out your gear and load out for your next run. Unlock all the songs and build your playlist so you can shred the powder to a wicked soundtrack!

translations.long_description:
Der Schöpfer von „1080 Snowboarding“ ist zurück mit einem völlig neuen Snowboard-Erlebnis! Gehe auf die Piste und erlebe realistisches Spielhallen-Snowboarden wie nie zuvor.

Beherrsche den Berg auf deine eigene Weise mit zwei einzigartigen Modi:
● Genieße den Geschwindigkeitsrausch und sichere dir den ersten Platz in der Bestenliste beim Spiel auf Zeit!
● Lerne Tricks und zeige dein Können im Freestyle-Modus!

Auf deinem Weg den Berg hinunter gibt es jede Menge Ausrüstung zum Aufsammeln. Schalte neue Boards, Handschuhe und sogar Mixtapes frei, um den Berg mit Stil zu erkunden! Du kannst auch in deiner Hütte entspannen, um deine Ausrüstung auszuchecken und Kraft für deine nächste Abfahrt zu tanken. Schalte alle Lieder frei und erstelle deine Wiedergabeliste, damit du den Pulverschnee zu einem krassen Soundtrack zerhackstückeln kannst!

translations.long_description:
여러분께 완전히 새로운 스노보딩 게임을 선사하고자  <1080 Snowboarding>의 개발진이 돌아왔습니다! 슬로프를 질주하며 지금껏 경험해 볼 수 없었던 리얼 아케이드 스노보딩을 즐겨보세요.

2가지의 독특한 모드를 통해 눈 덮인 산을 원하는 방식으로 즐겨보세요.
● 질주 본능을 선보이며 리더보드에서 정상을 향해 달려가는 타임 어택!
● 트릭을 마스터해서 마음껏 실력을 뽐낼 수 있는 프리스타일!

산을 탐험하는 동안 새로운 보드, 장갑, 심지어 새 음악을 담은 카세트테이프까지 찾을 수 있습니다. 다양한 아이템을 골고루 모아 유니크한 스타일로 산을 탐험하세요! 질주를 마친 후에는 따뜻한 오두막에서 휴식을 취하며, 지금까지 모은 장비를 살펴보고 다음 보딩을 위해 준비할 수도 있습니다. 음악을 전부 모아 보딩의 흥을 돋워줄 여러분만의 독특한 재생 목록을 즐겨보세요!

translations.long_description:
Le créateur de « 1080 Snowboarding » est de retour dans une nouvelle expérience de snowboard ! Dévalez les pistes et découvrez un jeu d'arcade de glisse hyper réaliste.

Domptez la montagne à votre façon dans deux modes inédits :
● Prouvez votre rapidité et dominez le classement du Contre-la-montre !
● Montrez que vous maîtrisez des tricks dans le mode Freestyle !

Des tas de pièces d'équipement vous attendent dans la montagne. Débloquez des planches, des gants et même des cassettes pour explorer les pistes avec style ! Vous pouvez aussi décompresser dans votre chalet, y inspecter votre équipement ou préparer votre prochaine sortie. Débloquez toutes les chansons et créez votre liste de lecture pour fouler la poudreuse sur des musiques d'enfer !

translations.display_name: CARVE スノーボーディング
translations.long_description:
『1080° テン・エイティ スノーボーディング』のクリエーターが全く新しいスノボ体験をひっさげて帰ってきた！斜面に飛び出して、今までにないリアルなアーケード系スノーボードに挑戦しよう。

2つのユニークなモードに挑み、自分のスタイルで山を支配しよう：
● タイムアタックモードでリーダーボードのトップに躍り出て、スピードへのこだわりを見せろ！
● フリースタイルモードでトリックを習得し、自分のスキルを披露！

山を滑りながら楽しめるギアがたくさん用意されている。スタイリッシュに山を滑るために、新しい板、グローブ、ミックステープを解除しよう！キャビンでは、自分のギアをチェックしたり、次の滑走に向けて準備したり、ゆったりと自分の時間を過ごすことができる。全部の曲を解除して自分のプレイリストを作り、最高のサントラを聞きながらパワフルに雪を削ろう！

translations.long_description:
¡El creador de “1080 Snowboarding” vuelve con una experiencia nuevísima! Golpea las laderas y vive un deporte de arcade más realista que ninguno.

Domina la montaña a tu estilo con dos modos únicos: 
● ¡Muestra tu sed de velocidad y obtén el primer puesto en las Clasificaciones de Ataque al tiempo! 
● ¡Domina trucos y luce tus habilidades con el modo Estilo libre!

Hay mucho equipamiento por encontrar mientras te abres camino por la montaña. ¡Desbloquea nuevas tablas, guantes e incluso mezclas para explorar las montañas con estilo! También te puedes relajar en tu cabaña para revisar tu equipamiento y recargar energías para tu próxima carrera. ¡Desbloquea todas las canciones y crea tu propia lista para que puedas jugar en la nieve a un ritmo fantástico!

changelog.change_log:
Carve Release Notes : 11 January 2022 Update (version 1.09)


We recognise there have been issues with the game crashing a lot for some players.
We are investigating and doing all we can to fix the issues we are able to. We're sorry for any inconvenience caused.


--- CHANGES & BUG FIXES ---

● Removed 90 Hz support for Quest 2.
● Fixed lighting issues on some Courses.
● Removed floating chalet from the sky at the beginning of Night Line Course.

Carve Release Notes : 26 October 2021 Update (version 1.09)


--- NEW CONTENT ---

New Event - Halloween Forever
● A new time-limited event, “Trick Or Treat” is live October 26th~November 26th.
● This event is a collaboration with the game Halloween Forever, exclusively for the Halloween season.
● New collectibles appear on every Course. Many of these are hoax items (Tricks), one of them is a real item (Treat) unique to this time-limited event (see below for details).

New Collectibles
● 7 new collectible items - 3 boards, 3 pairs of gloves and a tape - have been added and are available to collect via the Halloween event (see details above).
 -  Note that these items are only available to collect during the Halloween event, but will remain in your save data even after the event ends.

--- CHANGES ---

Play Tutorial Button
● The “Play Tutorial” button has been removed from the pause menu when on a Course, due to issues it was creating.
● The button is still available from the Cabin pause menu, and Main Menu screens.

Challenge Winners
● Added most recent Challenge winners' names to the end of the credits.


--- BUG FIXES ---

Tutorial Related Leaderboard Times
● Fixed a bug where the tutorial button could be used to obtain unrealistic Time Attack times.

Other Issues
● Fixed a bug with the board Yetee Flex.
● Fixed a bug with the awarding of the GG Kabira board.
● Fixed a bug with the display of one pair of Halloween gloves.

Carve Release Notes : 23 September 2021 Update (version 1.08)


--- NEW CONTENT ---

New Course - Night Line
● A seventh Course has been added, Night Line. Speed down the slopes of a resort town as darkness begins to descend.
    - Includes its own Leaderboards, and all new collectible items (see below for details).

New Collectibles
● 5 new collectible items - a board, two pairs of gloves and two tapes - have been added and are available to collect on the new Night Line Course.


--- CHANGES ---

Progression
● The new Night Line Course now appears as the third selectable Course in the UI (so Rock Caves becomes the 4th and so on, with Tempest now being the 7th).
● Medal requirements to unlock Courses have changed as follows:
    - Rock Caves (for players who have not yet unlocked it) now requires 2 medals from Night Line to unlock instead of 2 medals from Forest.
    - Tempest now requires 4 medals from the previous Course instead of 6.
● Time Attack bronze & silver medals have been made considerably easier to attain, to account for those players who have a hard time unlocking Courses. 
    - All bronze medal objectives now have 20~30 seconds added to them. 
    - All silver medal objectives now have 10~15 seconds added to them.
● Freestyle bronze medals have been made slightly easier to attain.
    - All bronze medal objectives now have 1000~6000 points subtracted from them. 
    - Valley’s silver medal objective now has 2000 points subtracted from it. 
    - Tempest’s silver medal objective now has 5000 points subtracted from it. 
● Note: Gold and Platinum all remain unchanged to preserve challenge for those players that want it. The above changes help ease the unlocking of all Courses for all players.

Challenge Winners
● Added Challenge winners' names to the end of the credits.

Updated a few Japanese and Spanish localised strings


--- BUG FIXES ---

Oculus Challenges
● Fixed issue with Time Attack Challenges not saving times sometimes.

Other Issues
● Fixed a bug with the Course start UI jitter.
● Fixed a bug with lamp posts not punishing players with visor snow if crashed into.
● Fixed a few minor issues with environment geometry.

Carve Release Notes : 6 August 2021 Update (version 1.07)


--- CHANGES ---

Quest 2 Version Improvements
● Enabled upgrade for Quest 2 players, better leveraging its superior hardware.
    - Adds anti-aliasing and increases frame rate to 90hz.
    - No action needed from players - improvements automatically applied if played on Quest 2.


--- BUG FIXES ---

Tutorial
● Changed saved data structure of Cabin tutorial to prevent the Cabin tutorial showing even once seen.

Oculus Challenges
● Fixed issue with Challenges not saving scores sometimes.

Carve Release Notes : 15 July 2021 Update (version 1.06)


--- CHANGES ---

● Leaderboards
Added “Play” button links for all 12 leaderboards in the Oculus universal menu / Scoreboards app.
Press the Play button (top right of chosen leaderboard) to quick-start a play session directly on that leaderboard’s Course and mode.


--- BUG FIXES ---

● Ghost Races
Fixed Ghost data crossing the finish line with a ~2 second delay. Now crosses the finish line at the expected time.
Fixed the HUD UI arrow overlapping its distance text element when the Ghost is too far ahead or behind.

● Tricks
Fixed issue with board frontside (FS) & backside (BS) not being recognised correctly.

Carve Release Notes : 29th June 2021 Update (version 1.05)


--- NEW CONTENT ---

● Freestyle Mode Leaderboards
Freestyle leaderboards have been added for all Courses! While unlike Time Attack you cannot race Freestyle ghosts, you can now compete against friends or the global leader for the best score. 

● HUD On/Off Option
From the pause menu you can now turn off the HUD (Heads Up Display) to remove all UI from the screen when on a Course for full immersion!


--- CHANGES ---

● Progression
Medal requirements to unlock Courses have changed as follows:
  - Rock Caves (Course 3) now requires 2 medals from the previous Course instead of 4.
  - Ice Caves (Course 4) now requires 3 medals from the previous Course instead of 6.
  - Descent (Course 5) now requires 4 medals from the previous Course instead of 6.
Time Attack bronze & silver medals have been made slightly easier to attain.
  - All bronze medal objectives now have 10 seconds added to them. 
  - All silver medal objectives now have 5 seconds added to them.
Freestyle bronze medals have been made slightly easier to attain.
  - All score-based bronze medal objectives now have 2000 points subtracted from them.

● Freestyle Mode Multiplier
Multiplier expiry timer now lasts for a fixed 10 seconds regardless of its size. Expiry time refreshes to 10 seconds on every successful trick, and freezes during airtime.
  - As a knock on effect, this change should make Freestyle medals easier to attain.

● Pause Menu
“Play Configuration” has been renamed to “Game Options” to better reflect the content.
HUD on/off option added to Game Options (see Newly Added section above).
“Play Tutorial” button has been moved from inside of “Game Options” to the top pause menu for better visibility & access.
“Training” has been renamed to “Practice Freestyle”.

● Tape Track Listings
Changed track listings of the following tapes:
  - Electronic Trax #1
     Changed from:
      Black Mustang vs. Kerrier District - Mad As Hell
      Foodman - Denshi
      Pillow Person - On Your Way (Bogdan Raczynski Remix)
      MFP vs. Cylob - 1999
     To:
      Black Mustang - Otherness
      Black Devil Disco Club (feat. Black Mustang) - Constantly No Respect
      Fimber Bravo - Life After Doomsday
      Raven - Feeler
  - Chillwave #1
     Changed from:
      Black Devil Disco Club (feat. Black Mustang) - Constantly No Respect
      Black Mustang - Otherness
     To:
      Black Mustang vs. Kerrier District - Mad As Hell
      Foodman - Denshi
      Pillow Person - On Your Way (Bogdan Raczynski Remix)
      MFP vs. Cylob - 1999
  - Electronic Trax #2
     Removed Fimber Bravo - Life After Doomsday
  - Chillwave #2
     Removed Raven - Feeler


--- BUG FIXES ---

● Leaderboards
Improved leaderboard loading reliability. Should now load as quickly as expected.
Ensured Global Leaderboards show for Valley.
Added loading indicator to make it clearer when loading is occuring.

● Other Issues
Fixed a bug where sometimes your best time would not be saved on Valley.
Removed unwanted Android permissions.
Fixed some graphical glitches on Ice Caves.
Increased lightmap resolution of the Practice Course.
